description:
Old 2048 Innovative Game With A Twist And Increased Difficulty Only 4x4 Board Mobile Friendly Contain Both 1470 And 2048.

How To Play:- Use Arrow keys to move tiles left, right, up, and down. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one! Every swipe, a new tile will randomly appear in an empty spot on the board with a value of either 1  or 7 For 1470 & 2 or 4 for 2048. Slide the tiles to merge them,1+1→2, 2+2→4 ,4+4→8,8+8→16 ...32 ...256 ...1024...& 7+7→14,14+14→28... 56...,112...,224...,1792 for 1470. Or  2+2→4, 8+8→16 ...32 ...256 ...1024..., For 2048 when 2048,1792 tile is created, you win! Play this amazing 1470 game and have fun!

Swipe the screen to move tiles left, right, up, and down. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one! Every swipe, a new tile will randomly appear in an empty spot on the board with a value of either 1  or 7 For 1470 & 2 or 4 for 2048. Slide the tiles to merge them,1+1→2, 2+2→4 ,4+4→8,8+8→16 ...32 ...256 ...1024...& 7+7→14,14+14→28... 56...,112...,224...,1792 for 1470. Or  2+2→4, 8+8→16 ...32 ...256 ...1024..., For 2048 when 2048,1792 tile is created, you win! Play this amazing 1470 game and have fun!
